snippet: Stocks closed higher on Thursday after Janet Yellen, nominee to lead the Federal Reserve, told a Senate committee that the Fed’s accommodative policies would continue.
abstract: Markets rise, with Dow Jones industrial average and Standard & Poor's 500-stock index once again hitting nominal highs, following encouraging testimony from Federal Reserve nominee Janet L Yellen.
lead_paragraph: Stocks closed higher on Thursday after Janet Yellen, nominee to lead the Federal Reserve, told a Senate committee that the Fed’s accommodative policies would continue.

headline.main: Shares Rise as Yellen Reassures on Stimulus
headline.print_headline: Shares Rise as Yellen Reassures on Stimulus
